entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
